answer: C
The speaker explains that "we don't pronounce God's holy four-letter name as it is written" and instead say "Adonai." This statement is accompanied by a full-screen slide with a blue Star of David on a dark background and white promotional text. Therefore, option C is the correct answer.

answer: D: A blue Star of David fills the screen with text about multi-million dollar efforts.

The speaker mentions that God's holy name was pronounced in the Jerusalem Temple during the priestly benediction and by the High Priest on Yom Kippur. The concurrent visual detail mentioned in the video is a blue Star of David filling the screen with text about multi-million dollar efforts. This matches option D. The other options describe different settings and visuals that are not mentioned in the audio.
